website_summaries.verdict: While it has a simple, classic look, this watch is also decorative enough for evening wear.
pros: Looks glamorous and elegant, with simple sunray dial and silver hour markings along side  crystal detailing
A good size but not too bulky for the average user
cons: Some people may find it too dressy for everyday wear

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product
customer_reviews.text: It's been less than 5 months I bought this watch and has only been worn twice. The stones on the periphery has started turning black. Lot of them already turned black and it's going down the hill from here. I really liked it when I got it for my wife, but it seems it really is a FAKE product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Shiv Kumar Verma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Can't wait to give it to my sister for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Melany

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. I took it into Macy's to have the links removed for $8 (I told them I bought it there but lost the receipt, not sure if it would've cost more otherwise). This watch is not a fake, I went to the MK store and was able to verify that. Really happy with the price! I love how it looks on me
customer_reviews.author: twinkyyslayerr

customer_reviews.title: love the watches
customer_reviews.text: love the watches! I'll attach the picture so you can see how perfect it is in life. the design is very pretty - it is a tri color: rose, golden and silver.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Really Like it. Watch looks genuine.
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. There were some black blemishes on the watch plastic but the watch itself was clean and new. And the box doesn't come with extra links and a little book that has instructions and warranty details, I know this because I bought a MK watch recently and it came with the little book in the box. Nevertheless the watch does look genuine. I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Akber Syed

customer_reviews.title: FAKE! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A FAKE! JOMASHOP IS RIPPING EVERYONE OFF! I just lost my darci, so I figured I'd buy one on here for cheaper. BIG mistake. At first, I noticed that the watch was MUCH lighter than my real one. Then, I took a look at the logo. The S isn't even in place correctly! To make it even worse, Michael Kors isn't printed across the back. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! What a joke...
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Grekoski

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch as a 2017 Christmas gift for granddaughter. It has not been even 6 months and the bracelet has lost the bracelet attachment pin and is therefore unwearable. First review of watch warranty seemed that it would be covered but then reading further it seems to be a more of a joke than a warranty. What is not covered - material and workmanship of the battery, case, crystal, strap or bracelet. So my question would be what is covered?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MICHAEL KORS WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS WATCH, THE COLOR IS AWESOME. I BROUGHT ONE ON A CRUISE LAST YEAR AND SOMEONE BROKE INTO MY HOUSE AND STOLE IT.
customer_reviews.author: adlewis

customer_reviews.title: WATCH ARRIVED WITHOUT A WORKING BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this watch. I loved it the first time and the second time as well. I was disappointed though that it arrived without a working battery and had to spend more money and time running around to get one installed so I could use the watch and enjoy it. Otherwise, I get many compliments and love it alot!
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: One year later and still stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stunning, gorgeous watch. The quality is beyond compare. I gave it to my daughter as a gift nearly a year ago and she has worn it almost every day. She was a server at a restaurant and the watch got knocked around quite a little bit. It is still beautiful. No missing stones, it's worth the investment. And she gets compliments on it all the time! I'm SO glad I made the decision to get it for her. :)
customer_reviews.author: KristineH

customer_reviews.title: Authentic 100%
customer_reviews.text: This watch is exactly what I wanted. I didn't even have to remove any links. I get lots of compliments. I'm super happy and would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: CORY

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for a few months, kept it in a box, and wore it a few times. When I was ready to take it out today, I found that all the stones and crystals on it had fallen like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Huang

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUYYY😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful watch ever 😭💓I got so many compliments and yes it is real and just so prettyyyyyy and this is the first actual brand watch and it's just beautiful,I would definitely recommend buying this it's just WOAHH
customer_reviews.author: marisa c.

customer_reviews.title: I think it's turned into one of her favorite presents, she loves the larger dial
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as stocking stuffer for my GF. I think it's turned into one of her favorite presents, she loves the larger dial, the color, the jewels. Everything about it just looks sophisticated with a touch of flash. It's definitely a head turner and something she wears everywhere now! I was a little worried about the dial being kind of large because she's smaller but if you're worried I'd still go for it, you'll be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this michael kors watch for one of my friends birthday and I cannot be more satisfied than this. The watch came in cool box. Everyhting looked so shiny and real. After searching for hours in internet to find the watch we ended up on buying the perfect one. I must say the time was worth it. We even took the watch in one of the michael kors retail shop and found out that it was indeed the real one and we got in a good deal. Definelty worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roven

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRESENT TO MYSELF!
customer_reviews.text: I squealed when I opened the box. It is absolutely stunning. I have had it on for fewer than six hours and already I've received compliment after compliment. It just screams "LOOK AT ME, I'M GORGEOUS!" The watch is classy and looks easily twice the price you pay for it. Well worth the money and goes with so much because of the crystals which allow for silver rings, etc. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Big but with  Big statement !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small wrist but with that said I love if watches are slightly loose I took it to my jeweler and he took out a few links, But with this also said I like my watches to feel like a slightly loose bracelet and this does, I've had a ton of Complements on it due to my wedding rings are in rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P

customer_reviews.title: I like the watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch, haven't verified if it's original BUT I do know it has been used, the clear cover on the clip from where it clips (where the Michael Kors is engraved) was removed, and it had finger prints on it. Also, the price of the watch was removed, the tag is still there but someone ripped it off as if they were giving it to someone as a gift. The face of the watch is very nice, the belt or whatever you call it is flimsy so it's not great quality. Overall it's ok, but disappointed it isn't new, I probably got a used one so I'm hoping it lasts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. Have several Michael Kors watches. Like them all and have had no problems with them
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous...the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same model in black 3 years ago but could not read the time in the dark, so found the same beautiful large style with ultra thin body and great band and jumped on it. Couldn't be happier. Michael Kors watches are stunning and keep perfect time. This is dressy and looks like a million bucks. And the price was fabulous...such a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Donohue

customer_reviews.title: At Last, A Gold Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't paying attention to the size when I ordered it, and I bought this watch, which is the 39mm size. It looked way too big for my wife's slim wrist, so I returned it and bought the 26mm size, which fits much better. Other than the size situation, the watch is quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Jan I. Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this watch! I have a few different Michael Kors watches and have bought them all through Amazon. I love that you can see clearly in the pictures how bit it will look on the wrist, and they are all such good quality! This watch is less bulky than the others I have and is really light weight! I would never buy a MK watch anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, This was a gift for my mother for her Birthday and she was beyond excited when she had opened this gift. Great look and I know that some people who have purchased this have had some bad luck with this purchase but I can only speak out of experience. Easy to resize (took it to a local watchman and cost 10 to resize). Shines great in the sun and in stores this watch was going for 195.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Late review. Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few years ago. Did not realize I had the option at the time to write a review.. But what better time to write a review after a few years of use. Still working great. Looks great. Was a great price. Looks great on my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get around water... whe I say ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get around water... whe I say that. I mean don’t wash your hands with it on. Have bought 2 of these in 6 months, both had water inside with weeks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really elegant and flashy. I took it to dillards to remove the links and they said it's real MK! So happy that i have this watch now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking comfortable watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. Was a bit concerned about the size (larger than I typically wear) but it is comfortable and the stones are not so large as to look gaudy. Recommend this if you are looking for a good looking dressier type piece.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Classy, comfortable, beautiful, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at a lot of watches and this one is my absolute favorite. It's the bigger style that's popular right now but it's not bulky - it's about 1/3 of the thickness of other similar watches. I love the pink gold because it gives it a different, unique look. It has some bling but can still be worn casual. It really is a classy looking watch that can be worn for most occasions. I also like that I can tell what time it is (versus watches with tiny dots in place of numbers, or nothing at all).
customer_reviews.author: CaptJray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Goes with everything. Very smooth and comfortable band!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and after few months the pin fell off. I called them and they said that the pin is not covered by the guarantee. So they said it is gonna cost me about $30 just to repair the pin, and plus the shipping charge. I thought this product would last long so I bought it! Not happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sajana Dumre

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking watch but I doubt the authenticity. It's obvious the watch I received was used. Watches I purchased from MK store had to have links removed. This watch fit without the need to remove or add links. No extra links or instructions, etc provided.
customer_reviews.author: CNun

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Gorgeous!! A friend liked it do much she ordered one too. Hers came from another vendor and wasn't in nearly as good a shape as mine. Hers seemed used. Not all the plastic peel protection pieces mine had. And when she went to have links taken out, it's band came apart in many pieces. Not the chunks of links like mine did. Took the jeweler an hour to remive three links from hers. Mine was done in five minutes. Hats off to the vendor I received mine through...a clean brand new watch. I get compliments daily in its beauty. It's a boyfriend watch without the bulk. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love it. I have been searching for the perfect watch and have found it. It's just the right size and I've gotten many compliments every time I wear it. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bold Bling
customer_reviews.text: Bling bling, this big bold face watch. This watch is so beautiful in person. I went on different websites to look at this watch from all angles. Macys, Nordstroms and amazon, the pics on Nordstrom is what sold me. The pics on amazon does not do this watch justice. It was a little tight so I called the Michael Kors customer service line and they sent me two free links. Ladies if you're looking for a bold big face watch this is it. Overall happy and satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: MIL Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my MIL in Mexico. This item qualified for international shipment, which I'm happy about, cause not a lot of items do. She got it quicker than expected and she says she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer92302

customer_reviews.title: Love my new watch which was for my birthday
customer_reviews.text: Love my new watch which was for my birthday! I have a best friend who has one(she lives 2000 miles away). I so admired her watch and kept thinking that wanted one too and I finally bought it! It definitely is a statement watch because of its size and bling. I wore it for the first time to girls night out and felt like it complimented my casual outfit. My friends loved it. I'll have no problem wearing this watch with dresses too.
customer_reviews.author: jelly bean

customer_reviews.title: Classy Elegance!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous, simple stated and very classy. I had to wear it to love it. It has a much thinner profile than most Michael Kors and it is really understated elegance. I get more compliments on this watch than my other 3 Michael Kors!. It is 3 tone. It has gold, silver and rose gold tones that are awesome together the way they used them in this watch. This is not a big bling watch, but it sure packs a punch!
customer_reviews.author: Chillin on the River

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful watch! A little tight, especially if you have a thicker wrist, but really beautiful all together.
customer_reviews.author: Raluca Popescu

customer_reviews.title: The stones around the dial turns black.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in 2016 for my girlfriend and she barely wore it so mainly it was on the box. Some of the stones around the dial turned black. For the money I paid I did not expect this poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend’s birthday. She’s had it for almost 2 years and it hasn’t turned any color or lost any stones. She takes good care of it though. I ended up getting the gold one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Malyta Vue

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, came with problems
customer_reviews.text: Ok I will be honest here. The watch is really nice, shiny and came in its original box. As for why I gave just 2 stars to the product is because it arrived damaged! My sister wanted to adjust the time and she wasn't able because the crown was stuck and when it did finally came out it didn't adjust the time at all. The battery also died after a couple of days. So I had to pay extra to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: david palma

customer_reviews.title: In love wit h this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item yesterday, and I couldnt be happier. I'm glad I purchased this watch. I was a bit nervous but the watch is very nice and pictures don't do it justice. Shipping was fast annd item was well poackaged
customer_reviews.author: Marby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just paid almost $200 for a fake watch. It's a good fake watch I guess but its definitely fake... Returning this and going to spend the extra $50 to get it off Michael Kors website. Honestly I thought Amazon Prime wouldn't allow fake stuff to be sold but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value but nothing fancy
customer_reviews.text: Best value but nothing fancy to look at. If you like simple this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Her 26th MK!
customer_reviews.text: Another quality MK watch and nice dial size. Colors are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Just got my watch and it is beautiful. I love to wear it
customer_reviews.text: Just got my watch and it is beautiful. I love to wear it. I wish that it was a little longer though as my wrists swell occasionally due to wrist damage. Unsure where I can get more links to adjust this watch. Super beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: April Alaspa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have now all three: rose tone, gold tone and now silver tone. This watch is both a dressy and an everyday watch. I've received many compliments. Most attractive feature is that the pave crystals look like real diamonds. The size is ideal for me, not just fancy but the dial is very readable night & day as well. Extremely pleased with my purchase and the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: N. Geter

customer_reviews.title: Timeless
customer_reviews.text: I receive so many compliments when I wear this watch. Very stylish and doesn’t look too big on the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bopp

customer_reviews.title: Just as I pictured it
customer_reviews.text: The watch is just as the picture shows. It's got great color, all of the stones were in tact, and the time was set when I received it. I had to get it adjusted, but still more cost effective than buying at a store. My only complaint is that it is difficult to adjust, and wound up being too tight or a bit loose. Overall I'm very happy with the watch and definitely recommend buying it through Amazon (which includes a 2 year warranty!)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Much much pretty in person glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Received this watch I must say it's very stunning! Much much pretty in person glad I got it. After seeing the quality of it I have purchased three other MK watches from Amazon. Very happy with my purchase love love love! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what I love is that it does not weight that much
customer_reviews.text: Decent MK watch for work ,what I love is that it does not weight that much
customer_reviews.author: Diana c.

customer_reviews.title: Fake watch with proof!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this watch and I am SO disappointed. This is my first mk watch ever, and I was really excited about it. I took it out of the Michael Kors box it came with, and it was really light in weight for a Michael Kors watch. Second, I examined the watch because I've read the reviews on here about it being not authentic. It's true. It's not. There was no "Michael Kors" name across the back of the face like a real one would have. And I paid $100+ for this item, of course assuming it was real. Who wouldn't for the price? I am returning the watch ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. The product came in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. The product came in perfect shape. I absolutely love it. I have several Michael Kors watches and this one may be my favorite. I love the crystals around the head of the watch. I also love the rose gold. I get compliments on it everywhere I go! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Grow

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It was better than I thought and at a good price. Exactly what I was hoping for. Nice enough for my girl to wear out and as an every day.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley A.

customer_reviews.title: Needs and extender
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch BUT the band was too tight. I like my bands to be loose like a bracelet. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Deakin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this watch! Super fast shipping and exactly as described. This appears to be a genuine Michael Kors watch and all the diamond are in tact! I receive many compliments on it, super feminine and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bling Bling
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half of use it still looks like new. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Good

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. It is just as described and the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Mckenney

customer_reviews.title: Was not what was expected..
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive this watch.. however, I was sent a used item.. and didn’t want to chance it again. Return was very easy, however. Color was not what was pictured, more brown/gold but was ok with that..
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Broken watch
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product until the band broke off and shattered into pieces. I thought this would be a good brand of watch, but it was not. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very beautiful watch. My wife’s loved it for her valentine’s gift
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: /very Sexy Watch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE MY WATCH!!!! It looks good on and I got lots of complements this passed weekend. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! Looks so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Looks so cheap. I'm surprised I have another MK watch and it is beautiful. I expect better quality for this brand. This will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Julia531

customer_reviews.title: Great overall watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best overall watch you can buy! I love it so much I also bought it in rose gold! The large face isn't too big on a small sized wrist and it's very easy to read. Perfect way to dress up any outfit! I didn't have to get a few links taken out but otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: HeyDay!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a long time, and Now I'm happy with it,So far it is keeping perfect time, though. The appearance is attractive and it feels "solid." Really quite good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Vassi

customer_reviews.title: I loved this Watch yes it is the real Michael Kors ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Watch yes it is the real Michael Kors watch nothing is cheap or fake about this gorgeous watch Quality beyond comparison got it in time for Christmas for myself Love Love Love it!!!! Wore it to a Christmas Eve Dinner and Christmas day it is wonderful for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Michael Kors Watch
customer_reviews.text: Battery was dead and cost me 17.99 for a new battery. First time that has ever happen. I've bought quite a few watches and this is the first time
customer_reviews.author: Love Michael Kors Watches

customer_reviews.title: Class
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch more then any of the other Michael Kors selections. I searched for several months, even on Black Friday, and still got the best deal from Amazon. This watch is very elegant and is so much more attractive in person. The product was shipped just in time for the holidays. Even with a busy time of the year for sales and shipping, UPS/ Amazon got the Michael Kors watch to me on time for a perfect Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Keith

customer_reviews.title: Classy watch!
customer_reviews.text: My watch was a gift and I love it! It is just what I needed to go with my gold jewelry! If you are not sure, order it, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: cjp

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: watch is beautiful , just band too small, never really did tried it
customer_reviews.author: Jorge C.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch came directly from China. It is inferior and a fake! I will not pay for it and am going to report it to all agencies. Amazon should bar this company for selling fake jewelry and ripping off both Michael Kors and the public!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty,and definitely cheaper than Macy's
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my coworker's daughter and she instantly fell in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch... Was a little too big, took it and had two links taken out and it fits perfect.. Saved the links just in case I gained weight🤔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Michael Kors Darcy Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love Michael Kors watches. I love the style and the color of this watch. It's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wood

customer_reviews.title: ... watch was defected (one stud issue) but replacement done easily and delivered next morning
customer_reviews.text: 1st order watch was defected (one stud issue) but replacement done easily and delivered next morning. and 2nd one came perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the watch but it’s too big for my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: buke09

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me this watch for Christmas, I’m in love with it. It’s totally authentic, came with in a nice box and with warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rana S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend and she loves it have not check in the store if is real yet ...but look it up online and is real
customer_reviews.author: Juan Amacedo

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Would like to thank the seller for responding on all questions and the watch is very nice thanks a lot
customer_reviews.author: Noura

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, I get compliments all the time. Will definitely re-order
customer_reviews.author: farah

customer_reviews.title: Want a response..
customer_reviews.text: I am still in the warranty period of this watch.. and the watch knob has been broken.. the watch which u send was not good I expect you guys gonna do something for this matter as this is a expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Sabitakoirala

customer_reviews.title: This is an expensive looking watch from the dial to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive looking watch from the dial to the diamond bezel to the band.The face is thoroughly modern as well. This watch is a timeless time piece and no matter what the "trend" is nor the brand in the future...It is a show piece and definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Always check your purchases for any possibility of damage.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed - the crystal face scratched. Returned the item immediately. May reorder in the future but not now. It was suppose to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: fran g.

customer_reviews.title: Stylin'
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and it looks great and the price was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: DirDick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! I did have two links taken out of the band for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Came with all of the anti scratch covers and it’s original box. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but dressy
customer_reviews.text: Band was too dressy looking for me. I ended up returning for something more casual.
customer_reviews.author: scotty2hotty

customer_reviews.title: Great but.....
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect. Bought it as a bday gift however it fits tight on my plus size friend.
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch but defective, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch very quickly, wore it twice before the pin fell out and the watch dropped to the ground and slightly cracked the face. It is a beautiful watch, if you decide to purchase it check the pins before wearing it. I contacted the company and they returned it, they refunded my money quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was Christmas gift for my sister a few years ago but she loves it
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Product is not fake!
customer_reviews.text: The product is not fake like the other users mentioned. I compared it with same watch from a department store and it was exactly same. From the box to the michael kors name on the back and the model numbers and weight..i think it is just cheaper than the retail price for wholesale reasons. It is a beautiful watch and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Watch
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find chocolate gold; I'm glad I found it at this price. Love it with my neutral uniform. Stylish and classy.
customer_reviews.author: danielle howerton

customer_reviews.title: Replica product, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Rose gold watch turned into black color. Looks like this is a replica of MK and not original one. Till a month watch was good when days started passing all of my watch turned into black color. I purchased it on April 3, not even 3months product lost its grace
customer_reviews.author: Priya K.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is not as bulky as many of the other Michael Kors watches I have seen in the store. The three tone metal makes it go with any of my jewelry. I have lots of watches but this is the one I wear predominately. I highly recommend, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernLady

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this watch. It broke the 2nd time I wore it and when I tried to contact the seller there was no response. I finally had to contact customer service at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this Tri Color Design
customer_reviews.text: Love my Michael Kors watch, I have been wearing it for over a year now and it still holds the time perfectly. After some wear the rose gold on the band has tarnished a tad in certain places, but nothing a polishing won't take care of and is to be expected with constant wear. Always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Ash727

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this watch and I love it. It is beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.author: Deneen Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Watch band too small
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very nice however it’s small and I wonder if I can buy two extra links to adjust and resize the watch band to fit my hand size .. I’m an international customer and I can be reached via email: mirna@damaventures.com or mobile 00962788002001; please advise
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Al Ashram

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful watch but had to return...
customer_reviews.text: I received the item so excited to wear it. When I opened the box I found out one of the crystals on the surface was missing, discolored or cracked. It looked as if you had a missing tooth when you smile. It is a beautiful watch and I love the size and the design. Unfortunately, I had to return the it. As I was so excited, it was pretty devastating to see the one little missing part.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Michael kors is supposed to be ungraceful in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fake! Michael kors is supposed to be engraved in the middle of the back of the watch but instead on the bottom back. So fake! please don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt McKenna

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Darci Three-Hand Watch with Glitz Accents, 39mm
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Equally glamorous as it is restrained, this Michael Kors™ timepiece will find its way into your ensemble night after night.
 * Silver-tone stainless steel case and bracelet.
 * Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement.
 * Silver-tone sunray dial includes hour markers.
 * Pavé crystal setting on top ring.
 * Water resistant 5 ATM/50 meters.
 * Measurements: *  Case Height: 39 mm
    *  Case Width: 39 mm
    *  Case Depth: 7 mm
    *  Band Width: 19 0⁄1 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 8 1⁄4 in
    *  Weight: 3.22 oz

feature_bullets: Silver-tone round watch with double row of pave-set crystals in bezel and sunray dial
39 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Stainless steel band with fold-over clasp with double push-button safety
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
